verbose_text: Accordingly, several chemical inhibitors of protein folding procedures such as tunicamycin (TM; inhibitor of N glycosylation), dithiothreitol (DTT) or beta-mercaptoethanol (beta-ME; permeable reducing agents), and thapsigargin (TG; inhibitor of the Ca 2+ pump in ER) induce the UPR response.
evidence: TG; inhibitor of the Ca 2+  pump in ER
